name: EXCLUSIVE: New EMIRATES A380 Business Class you’ve NOT seen before…
description:
The first review on YouTube of the 2021 Emirates Business Class!

Delivered just a few weeks ago, this Airbus A380 features the newest of Emirates’ Business Class products. Today I’m going to do a comprehensive review of this product, give you guys my honest feedback on it and whether you should fly it? 

As always I’ll also explain exactly how I booked this, because as usual I paid a lot less for this ticket! 

Follow me on IG: will.luxurytravel
